                    $( document ).ready(function() {
                        function press(key)
                        {
                            var e = jQuery.Event( "keydown", { which: key, keyCode: key } );
                            jQuery( "body" ).trigger( e );
                        }
                        
                        $( "#left" ).click(function() {
                            press(37);
                        });
                        $( "#up" ).click(function() {
                            press(38);
                        });
                        $( "#down" ).click(function() {
                            press(40);
                        });
                        $( "#right" ).click(function() {
                            press(39);
                        });
                        $( "#reset" ).click(function() {
                            press(82);
                        });
                        $( "#pause" ).click(function() {
                            press(32);
                        });
                        /*$( "#bot" ).click(function() {
                            press(66);
                        });
                        $( "#minus" ).click(function() {
                            press(189);
                        });
                        $( "#plus" ).click(function() {
                            press(187);
                        });*/
                        
                        var status_audio = false;
                        var audioElement = document.createElement('audio');
                        audioElement.setAttribute('src', '/website_pinetwork_games_odoo/static/src/music/music.mp3');
                        audioElement.addEventListener('ended', function() {
                            this.play();
                        }, false);
                        
                        $('#play').click(function() {
                            if(!status_audio)
                            {
                                audioElement.play();
                                status_audio = true;
                                $(this).attr('src','/website_pinetwork_games_odoo/static/src/music/music.png');
                            }
                            else
                            {
                                audioElement.pause();
                                status_audio = false;
                                $(this).attr('src','/website_pinetwork_games_odoo/static/src/music/mute.png');
                            }
                        });
                        
                        $( "#clear_cache" ).click(function() {
                            var result = confirm("Are you sure you want to Clear Cache?, it will reloads the page.");
                            if(result)
                            {
                                try {
                                    Cache.delete();
                                } catch (err) {
                                    console.error(err);
                                }
                                try {
                                    window.location.reload(true);
                                } catch (err) {
                                    console.error(err);
                                }
                            }
                        });
                    });
